control.description: composite control consisting of a list control and a thumbnail panel

subitems.subitem: <controls> <control> <description>background</description> <type>image</type> <posX>0</posX> <posY>0</posY> <width>560</width> <height>560</height> <texture flipY="yes" diffuse="Thumb_Mask_test.png" mask="music_filmstrip_mask.png">black.png</texture> </control> <control> <description>General Info</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>10</posY> <width>520</width> <label>#(L(171)) #mvCentral.ArtistName</label> <font>fontB11</font> <align>left</align> <textcolor>gainsboro</textcolor> </control> <control> <description>Tracks by Artist</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>42</posY> <width>520</width> <font>font10</font> <textcolor>gainsboro</textcolor> <label>#mvCentral.Translation.Videos.Label: #mvCentral.VideosByArtist [#mvCentral.Translation.TotalRuntime.Label #mvCentral.ArtistTracksRuntime]</label> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.ArtistView, true)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Album Name</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>42</posY> <width>520</width> <font>font10</font> <textcolor>gainsboro</textcolor> <label>#mvCentral.Translation.Album.Label: #selecteditem</label> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.AlbumView, true)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Video Title</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>32</posY> <width>520</width> <font>font10</font> <textcolor>gainsboro</textcolor> <label>#mvCentral.Translation.Video.Label: #selecteditem</label> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.TrackView, true)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Tracks on Album</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>70</posY> <width>520</width> <font>font10</font> <textcolor>gainsboro</textcolor> <label>[#mvCentral.Translation.Tracks.Label #mvCentral.TracksForAlbum | #mvCentral.Translation.TotalRuntime.Label #mvCentral.AlbumTracksRuntime]</label> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.AlbumView, true)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Album Genre</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>70</posY> <width>520</width> <font>font10</font> <textcolor>ffa9d0f7</textcolor> <align>left</align> <label>#mvCentral.ArtistTags</label> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.ArtistView, true)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Artist Bio</description> <type>textboxscrollup</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>100</posY> <width>520</width> <height>140</height> <align>left</align> <font>font10</font> <lineSpacing>3</lineSpacing> <textcolor>gainsboro</textcolor> <label>#mvCentral.ArtistBio</label> <seperator>-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------</seperator> <scrollStartDelaySec>10</scrollStartDelaySec> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.ArtistView, true)</visible> </control> <control> <id>1</id> <description>Track Description</description> <type>textboxscrollup</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>100</posY> <width>520</width> <height>140</height> <label>#mvCentral.TrackInfo</label> <seperator>-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------</seperator> <font>font10</font> <lineSpacing>3</lineSpacing> <scrollStartDelaySec>10</scrollStartDelaySec> <visible>[string.equals(#mvCentral.TrackView, true)|string.equals(#mvCentral.AlbumView, true)]</visible> </control> <control> <description>SD/HD Fullscreen/Widescreen</description> <type>image</type> <posX>20</posX> <posY>55</posY> <width>65</width> <height>44</height> <texture>Logos\resolution\#mvCentral.LocalMedia.videoresolution.png</texture> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.TrackView, true)</visible> </control> <!-- Video Codecs --> <control> <description>Video Codecs</description> <type>image</type> <posX>140</posX> <posY>55</posY> <width>65</width> <height>44</height> <texture>Logos\Video\#mvCentral.LocalMedia.videocodec.png</texture> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.TrackView, true)</visible> </control> <!-- Audio Channels / Codecs--> <control> <description>Audio Codecs / Channels</description> <type>image</type> <posX>250</posX> <posY>55</posY> <width>65</width> <height>44</height> <texture>Logos\Audio\#mvCentral.LocalMedia.audiochannels.png</texture> <visible>string.equals(#mvCentral.TrackView, true)</visible> </control> </controls>

control.description: Metadata Progress Bar (This is set hidden by MvC if value 0 or 100)
